DOC.brief_summary: The aim study comparison two different lead capability detect episodes duration paroxysmal atrial fibrillation ( AF ) atrial tachyarrhythmia ( AT ) , rejection far field sense far field R-wave ( FFRW ) .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim study comparison two different lead capability detect episodes duration paroxysmal AF AT rejection far field sense far field R-wave ( FFRW ) . The study aim evaluate accuracy detection atrial tachyarrhythmias ( ATAs ) . An improved detection potentially increase accuracy clinical treatment decision , base device derive data .
DOC.criteria: Patients class I II pace indication Sick Sinus Syndrome suspect paroxysmal atrial tachyarrhythmias last 6 month Signed informed consent Age > 18 yr Severe valvular heart disease ( echocardiogram less 6 month old ) Angina Pectoris class ≥ III Congestive heart failure NYHA class ≥ III Left Ventricular Ejection Fraction < 35 % ( le 6 month old ) Hypertrophic Cardiomyopathy
